While I haven’t always been [very impressed by the NUJ](http://www.onemanandhisblog.com/archives/2007/11/nuj_forget_the_customers_and_theyll_forget_you.html) of late, this latest bit of campaigning is spot on:
Rather ironically, given the NUJ’s wariness about blogging, this was spotted on the blog-based [Journalism.co.uk](http://blogs.journalism.co.uk/editors/2008/09/10/nuj-release-video-showing-police-treatment-of-journalists/)…
